resources.string: "YoUr LoVe RaTe" is an application developed by iCODE Studios. This is aimed at helping the youth engaged in relationships to have fun just by checking the percentage at which their partners love them. However, this is does not guarantee the correctness of the percentage of love shown by a partner. Have fun with the application. !!!...Wow...!!!
